price: (Turamubwira tuti) “Cura ingabo nini z’amakote (y’icyuma ameze nk’utuyungirizo) kandi ugere neza utwenge twayo, ndetse munakore ibikorwa byiza.” Mu by’ukuri Njye ndi Ubona bihebuje ibyo mukora.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
